tweets.post: Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the cards content.Card titles are used by adding .card-title to a <h*> tag. In the same way, links are added and placed next to each other by adding .card-link to an <a> tag
some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the cards content.

Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the cards content. Card titles are used by adding .card-title to a <h*> tag. In the same way, links are added and placed next to each other by adding .card-link to an <a> tag

Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the cards content. Card titles are used by adding .card-title to a <h*> tag. In the same way, links are added and placed next to each other by adding .card-link to an <a> tag
